title: Claude Code SDK Launch & Platform Updates
description: Anthropic released official TypeScript and Python SDKs for Claude Code, enabling developers to embed Claude Code capabilities directly into custom applications, along with fine-grained tool streaming in public beta.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code can trivially be used as part of automation through the tools means it's now the default way I'm thinking about coding agents
I have had to rewrite every single line of code that Claude Code produced. It hasn't by itself found the right abstractions at any level

title: Controversial Pricing Model Changes
description: Cursor shifted from request-based to usage-based pricing for Pro plan, eliminated BYOK option, and introduced $200/month Ultra plan, causing significant community backlash.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor's New Pricing Model Is Absolute Garbage
Cursor just pulled a classic VC-backed bait-and-switch
Okay I admit, Cursor Ultra plan is pretty good

title: Premium Request Billing & Claude Models Integration
description: GitHub implemented consumptive billing for premium requests at $0.04 each after monthly limits, and added Claude Sonnet 4 and Opus 4 availability for paid plans, marking a major shift from unlimited usage.

community_feedback.quote: GitHub Copilot going from 'unlimited' to $0.04 per premium
I ran out of premium requests on my Pro Plan. I literally just started using it
Claude feels like pairing with a careful junior engineer who drafts a plan and diffs for your review

title: Claude Sonnet 4 and Opus 4 Integration
description: GitHub added Claude Sonnet 4 to all paid Copilot plans and Claude Opus 4 to Enterprise and Pro+ plans, expanding AI model options beyond OpenAI.

community_feedback.quote: GitHub Copilot with the Claude 4 model became one of my favourite combinations in recent months
Claude 4 Opus and GPT 4.5 models are not appearing in GitHub Copilot Pro+ subscriptions

title: Cascade Enhancements and UI Redesign
description: Windsurf released major Cascade enhancements including new Cascade Bar for easier navigation, UI redesign of Chat and home panels, and improved autocomplete performance across all platforms.

community_feedback.quote: Windsurf has the best UX compared to Cursor
Cascade has been really, really laggy after recent updates
Windsurf SWE-1.5 is much faster, more reliable than Cursor Composer-1
